title: Salmacida spolia A masque. Presented by the King and Queenes Majesties, at White-hall, on Tuesday the 21. day of Ianuary 1639.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T[homas] H[arper] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the flying Horse neere Yorke house,
